transit_routes.name: Port Complex
transit_routes.note: Large self-contained port with pools, restaurants, beach.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Mahahual Village
transit_routes.note: Authentic fishing village. Beach clubs, restaurants.

transit_routes.name: Chacchoben Ruins Excursion
transit_routes.note: 1-hour drive inland. Less crowded than Tulum.

featured_experiences.name: Chacchoben Mayan Ruins
featured_experiences.note: Well-preserved ruins. Easier access than Tulum from here.

featured_experiences.name: Port Pool Day
featured_experiences.note: Stay close to ship. Everything you need at port complex.

featured_experiences.name: Bacalar Lagoon
featured_experiences.note: 2-hour drive but spectacular. Freshwater lagoon. Worth it.
